snippet: The public puts Joseph R. Biden Jr. at the top of the list of six Democratic and Republican candidates tested on several qualities they say will affect their vote, with most saying he cares about their needs and problems, is honest and trustworthy...
abstract: The public puts Joseph R. Biden Jr. at the top of the list of six Democratic and Republican candidates tested on several qualities they say will affect their vote, with most saying he cares about their needs and problems, is honest and trustworthy and has the right kind of experience to be a good president.

headline.main: Poll Watch: Voters Like Joe Biden on Honesty, and Donald Trump on Leadership
